channel.title: Final devolution 2.6 prefect combat
channel.description:
SERVER BASE: dev 7.0 CREDITS: ME AND KNOVA, Steven (own_prox) for the client. [size=10pt][b] GF DELTA, GF DYNASTY, GF ICLARITY.[/b][/size]
FEATURES
-TRADING DOES WORK, no more bs closing. says the other players amount of free spaces aswel. -friends list works.
- NPC COMBAT some of you may have seen an early release to this server which npc combat sucked!! i was aware of this, and i have got the full extent to make sure it now meets your needs. - i have fixed gfx on npcs, it now lets you see the grahpics on them. - Fixed npcs double hitupdate masks, before if two players hit at the same time it would freeze the client, this is now no longer an issue as i have made sure all the hits are taken into account and are displayed properly. -Ranging has been fixed, before it would walk up to them while ranging. -Magic has remade again, it now has correct timings and has the perfect delay for showing the damage AFTER the grahpic is shown, Adding npc freezing/binding, fixed using magic on npcs, before if you had not attacked a npc yet you couldnt mage them, spent an hour setting up the hitting for the server so you cannot click use spell on a different npc then quickly click another to bug it and only the last npc clicked takes the hit, this is all fixed it will wait until its finished attacking the npc then it will attack the one after. when using magic and you tell it to use a spell after another it will wait until the time is right then use the spell you had selected. when using melee and then using a spell it would cast the spell straight away, now it will wait till the attack is over then cast the spell then it goes back to using melee!. -NPC DEFENSE, i have created a simple system for npc defense which does work it has the options for ranging def, magic def and melee defence. -Hitting 0's on npcs will make them attack you back, alot of people requested this and i did find the solution to it.
TELEPORTING - i have fixed normal teleports so it will always be in perfect timings.
PROCESS AND PLAYERPROCESS - i have removed the possiblilty to mass click on the server which would either make you lag and stand still for ages or simply dc you. all the process probelms have been fixed. so there is 100% no mass clicking anything. - no delay for clicking things such as the special bar and so on, its INSTANT. - fixed logging in issues. - fixed somethings to allow 0ms logins, NO DELAY. -READ THIS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! DO NOT use the process for timing things if you wanna time something use [code]public boolean playerProcess() { [/code] or [code]public boolean timers() {[/code]PVP COMBAT this is by far better than my already good npc combat. - nearly 100% perfect features, i have spent a massive amount of time on this to get it exactly right to how it use to be. - follows and stops while autocasting, ranging and meleeing. -Freezing players automatically freezes them. -Magic on players, the damage shows after the GFX is shown like how rs is. -100% perfect autocasting for normal magic, sorry i left ancients out cause its so simple you guys can add it. -100% perfect melee combat, if frozen, you cannot move or attack players who are not right next to you. -100% perfect special bar, deducting, switching weapons etc. the bar is always correct now and restores in 1/10ths at a time. -if autocasting and you run out of runes it will automatically start wacking them with the staff, this is after it runs up to them ofcorse =). -Staffs work how they should, for example if you have a air staff and no air runes and you have some mind runes you can use the wind strike spell. -ring of recoils work perfectly and use doublehitupdate masks if needed. -All hits that are dealt to and from a dead player/person are dropped, meaning they do not even show. -100% working pk skulls, need my client to see them.
The server is packaged in a realy easy to read style, this is good for beginner people as everything is named to what is does!. none of this src, net bs!
tonnes of working skills which work very well.
Media
Player processing fixed - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWKqSXwv_9s Player processing fixed 2 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h_igjN9o5as Agility - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kM6WLjnvdVI Woodcutting - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GEpouPOroVc Mining - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gz4jm50VgXc Thieving - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i8NSDwH7zhU
Woodcutting - needs levels - needs axes - cuts the tree down (globally) - tree will respawn (globally)
Mining - needs levels - needs picaxe - removes the ore from the rock (globally) - ore respawns (globally)
Thieving - need levels - if caught thieving for a npc they will punch you and deal damage and it stuns you. - stall stealing, items from stalls are removed after being taken.
Runecrafting - need levels - abyss works - correct x etc..
Smithing - smelts ores - possible to make all items
Fishing - nearly 100% to rs
Cooking - auto cooks all the food of the same id. - correct levels etc..
Aglilty - the best working aglilty which is combined with your energy to make you restore energy faster depending on how your stats are. - full emotes plus creater style agility.
Herblore - Identifys the herb - makes potions
All skills have there very own class file located in the skill folder. Commands are handled by a hashmap.
Quest System. -contains 2 premade quests, go to constants.java and turn story mode on to have a tutorial for the server. reads text docs, supports up to 18 quests at this moment, too easy to add more.
SPECIAL COMMANDS ::addnpc id distanceiscanwalk ( this will automatically spawn a npc on the server, it will walk the distance you told it to, has correct hp, has correct emote, add to autospawn. :: setexp amount (changes the servers entire experience rate, this means all skills) read the command folder for all the other commands, each command has there own class file. the old style of using commands required the names to be the exact correct upper or lowercase print, this wont matter it will still use the command.
THIS IS NOT A JOKE OF A SERVER THERE HAS BEEN SOME SERIOUS AMOUNTS OF HOURS SPENT ON THIS.
Server DL (705.09kb) i do not care about rep, i just ask for you to give me a fair and honest review of the server once you try it, thanks!. http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9LHP61VO
Client download (credits to steven (own_prox)); http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KW3JUYES
mirror: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?jzwykn0ywzj its got auto cache downloader all old features a few bug fixes and just edit stevensconfig.java to change any info and sign.java to change cache this client is galkons base with a new hp bar and new magic screen, also fully working skulls. enjoy.

item.title: Final devolution 2.6 prefect combat
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

kshdiver:

no pics no dl

Why is that? To lazy to download and check it out?

I downloaded it and its great, clean programing, fairly stable, and there are already many helpful methods in there so you don’t have to write up a bunch of little things. What else could you ask for… The gameplay is pretty much blank how it is, so no point in pictures really. The videos showing the combat and skills are good though, you should check them out.
